description: From Ancient Greek ἐπένδυμα (epénduma), "upper garment", from ἐπενδύνω (ependúnō, “I put on over”) +‎ -μα (-ma, noun suffix), from ἐπι- (epi-, “on, over”) +‎ ἐνδύνω (endúnō, “I put on (clothes)”).

entries.meaning: (anatomy) The thin membrane of glial cells lining the ventricles of the brain and the central canal of the spinal cord.
